snippet: Third seed Stan Wawrinka saved a match point at the U.S. Open on Saturday before squeezing past unheralded Briton Dan Evans in five sets to reach the fourth round....
lead_paragraph: Third seed Stan Wawrinka saved a match point at the U.S. Open on Saturday before squeezing past unheralded Briton Dan Evans in five sets to reach the fourth round.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Saves Match Point to Beat Unseeded Evans
headline.main: Wawrinka Saves Match Point to Beat Unseeded Evans
